channel.title: 99% Real Godsword Stance!
channel.description:
I have tweaked around with this model for about a half an hour, and I think I have it to about 99% REAL Godsword stance. I implemented a Zamorak Godsword into the model to help me with getting it just right. Here is a pic of the front view, both side views, and the back view.
[IMG]http://i287.photobucket.com/albums/ll133/jojo12995/fullview.jpg[/img]
I MIGHT release this to the public if me or someone can teach me how to put these animations into my server+client. Anyways enjoy looking!

item.title: 99% Real Godsword Stance!
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

CoonHunter:

Lol, look at the time of post and current time, been a while, and STILL no post. Seems like he is looking for a client with em he can use.

Umm no I’m just showing off my progress and I only asked for how to put it in my client/server not asking for someone to give me one. Next time read.

Read full topic

item.title: 99% Real Godsword Stance!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“GalkonsPride, post:16, topic:293391”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=388233.msg2904098#msg2904098 date=1249696164]
If you release you’ll ruin a ton of stuff. Do not release. Noobs are getting to spoon fed. And honestly, my server already has REAL gs stances on a 317. We just need to release client to the public. The next question is, what about Special attack emotes?
[/quote]

Bull.

This looks good, nice work going to start looking into the poser. <3 MrP.[/quote]

Galkon wanna bet?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2009, 11:33:44 pm[/size][hr][quote=“cocoa, post:15, topic:293391”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=388233.msg2904098#msg2904098 date=1249696164]
If you release you’ll ruin a ton of stuff. Do not release. Noobs are getting to spoon fed. And honestly, my server already has REAL gs stances on a 317. We just need to release client to the public. The next question is, what about Special attack emotes?
[/quote]

You don’t have the actual emote you liar. Shut up unless you’re going to provide proof.[/quote]

Hmm okay, what ever u say, ill post it on client hacking section
